overview: Young Guy Brancato and  parents have to move from Elko, Nevada to Los Angeles, California, they are unable to take Guy's dog Pete. Guy is angry at his parents and even more distressed when he learns that Pete has run away from the neighbor who was tending him. But Pete has plans to travel to Los Angeles on his own.
tagline: A Boy and His Dog Separated by 600 Miles.
title: The Silent Call
